Articles.Content:
For small Res-ish screens.

Programs used:

Paint Tool SAI (Drawing the Lens-flare)

Photoshop (Adding the Logo)

Disclaimer: Kerbal Space Program logo was made by Squad, Not me.

http://www.sickle2596.deviantart.com

- My DeviantArt, if you so wish to see my other art.

Edited July 31, 2013 by Sickle
Added Link to my DeviantArt

This is really good! However, one thing stands out to me

There's no background objects - you can't see a planet and the nebula like ring isn't there. I still think its good though

There's no background objects

I agree; its very nice as it is, but maybe you could edit in planets from another screen shot; it says you used photoshop but sai for the lens flare, if its just a matter of not knowing how to make the lens flare perfect on PS then just render one in the middle of a pure black layer and then set it to screen mode (layer property) and then just shift it about. If its just that sai's lens flares are preferable then ignore me
The lens Flare is Manually drawn
